name: Animated Songs and Video Lessons for Primary Children
description: Curriculum-linked educational songs and video lessons designed for children aged 3–9 — including early learners and English language learners. Covering EYFS, KS1, and lower KS2 in the UK, and equivalent stages like Pre-K to Grade 3 in the US or Foundation to Year 4 in Australia.

educationalAlignment.educationalFramework: UK National Curriculum, US Common Core, Australian Curriculum, New Zealand Curriculum
educationalAlignment.targetName: Curriculum-aligned educational songs and tutorials for primary classrooms and English language learning

audience.audienceType: primary, elementary, EYFS, early childhood, lower elementary, Foundation Stage, English language learner

name: Downloadable Classroom Resources for Primary Teachers
description: Printable PDFs, worksheets, visual aids and planning tools for children aged 3–11 — aligned with EYFS, KS1 and KS2 in the UK, and equivalent stages like Pre-K to Grade 5 in the US or Foundation to Year 6 in Australia. Often used alongside our songs and videos to reinforce learning for both native English speakers and English language learners.

educationalAlignment.educationalFramework: UK National Curriculum, US Common Core, Australian Curriculum, New Zealand Curriculum
educationalAlignment.targetName: Downloadable and printable teaching materials across core primary subjects and English language support

audience.audienceType: primary, elementary, EYFS, early childhood, lower elementary, Foundation Stage, English language learner

name: School Plays & Assemblies for Primary Children
description: Original school plays and assemblies designed for children aged 3–11 — suitable for EYFS, KS1 and KS2 in the UK, and equivalent stages like Pre-K to Grade 5 in the US or Foundation to Year 6 in Australia. Designed to be inclusive and accessible, they are enjoyed by both native English speakers and children learning English.

educationalAlignment.educationalFramework: UK National Curriculum, Ontario Curriculum, Australian Curriculum
educationalAlignment.targetName: Drama and performance opportunities for primary-aged learners and language development

audience.audienceType: primary, elementary, EYFS, early childhood, lower elementary, Foundation Stage, English language learner

name: Silly School Education
description: Silly School Education is a teacher-led educational platform providing curriculum-aligned songs, videos, and printable teaching resources for primary and elementary school teachers worldwide. Used both in classrooms and by English language learners, our content supports phonics, literacy, maths and more through music, animation and fun.

audience.audienceType: primary, elementary, EYFS, early childhood, lower elementary, Foundation Stage, English language learner
